author: W. E. Messamore
title: Mortgage Applications Crater 30% in Worst Fall Since Housing Market Burst
description: Mortgage applications cratered 30% in the biggest decline since 2009, while a tidal wave of housing market defaults spills over into banking. The post Mortgage Applications Crater 30% in Worst Fall Since Housing Market Burst appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Mortgage applications fell 29.4% last week.
  • Thats the housing markets biggest decline since 2009.
  • Meanwhile, distressed mortgage REITs cant cover margin calls.
Mortgage applications cratered last week in another perilous sign … [+3788 chars]
